body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Welcome to Sweet Treats Bakery support. My name is Justin Jackson. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, this is Maria Butler. I'm really frustrated. Your website shows that you have no flour left in stock!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Maria. Let me help you with that. Could you please provide your phone number in case we get disconnected?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Maria. I would also need your email address to send you a follow-up on this issue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for that information. I'm checking our inventory now. It appears there might be a glitch in the system. We should have flour in stock.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: This is unacceptable! I needed that flour for an order today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Maria. I will personally ensure this gets resolved immediately and update you with accurate inventory information shortly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience and for bringing this to our attention. I'll get back to you as soon as possible. Have a great day, Maria!
